sentences.en: A literary sculptor par excellence, Rodin enjoyed depicting themes from ancient mythology.
sentences.cn: 这是一件杰出并结合文学与艺术的雕塑, 源自于希腊神话.
雕塑家把材料塑造成雕塑品.

sentences.en: Edgar Degas , French Impressionist painter and sculptor , was born in Paris.
sentences.cn: 法国印象派画家、雕刻家 埃德加·狄加 诞生于巴黎.

sentences.en: French painter and sculptor Georges Braque died at 80 on August 31.
sentences.cn: 1963年8月31日,法国画家、雕刻家乔治·勃拉克逝世,享年80岁.

sentences.en: Gillies saw the plastic surgeon as a sculptor.
sentences.cn: 吉利斯把整形外科医生看作是雕塑家.

sentences.en: He can make a good sculptor.
sentences.cn: 他能成为一名优秀的雕刻家。

sentences.en: He has the face as though an Aztec sculptor had attempted a portrait of Seba stian.
sentences.cn: 他的脸,好象墨西哥印第安人(阿兹台克人)雕刻家试着刻出来的塞巴斯蒂安的雕像.

sentences.en: He is eminent both as a sculptor and as a portrait painter.
sentences.cn: 他既是着名的雕刻家又是杰出的肖像画家.

sentences.en: He is eminent both as a sculptor as a portrait painter.
sentences.cn: 他既是著名的雕刻家又是杰出的肖像画家.

sentences.en: He turned his artistic gifts to good account by becoming a sculptor.
sentences.cn: 他发挥艺术天才,成了雕刻家.

sentences.en: The ivory Buddha carved by Shen Weizhong, a contemporary Chinese sculptor, is the world's smallest piece of sculpture, its size being just four - fifths that of a grain of rice.
sentences.cn: 中国当代雕刻工艺师沈为众雕刻的象牙佛像是世界上最小的雕刻.这个象牙佛像只有一粒米的 五分之四 大.

sentences.en: The sculptor chiselled the lump of marble into a fine statue.
sentences.cn: 雕刻家把大理石块凿成优美的雕像.

sentences.en: The sculptor was at work chiseling a statue.
sentences.cn: 雕塑家正在雕琢一尊雕像.

sentences.en: The statue embodies the sentiment of the sculptor.
sentences.cn: 这座雕像具体表现出雕刻家的情感.

sentences.en: There was a great demand for engravings of his portrait, and his head was being modelled by an admiring sculptor.
sentences.cn: 人们强烈要求要帮他做一个雕塑，一位有名的雕刻家正在把他的头像做成模型。

sentences.en: This is what the sculptor must do.
sentences.cn: 这正是雕塑家所必须做的事.

sentences.en: Thus, alluvial channel flows are simultaneously sculptor and sculpture.
sentences.cn: 这样, 冲积河槽水流既是塑造者,同时又是被塑造者.

sentences.en: We can take the mysterious， hazy future and carve out of it anything that we can imagine， just like a sculptor carves a statue from a shapeless stone.
sentences.cn: 我们可以掌握神秘而不可知的未来，从中创出我们所能想象的任何东西，一如雕刻家可以将未成型的石头刻出雕像一样。

words.tran_cn: 用刻纹装饰的；具刻纹的
雕刻；用雕塑装饰（sculpture的过去式）

trans.tran_cn: 雕刻家，雕塑家，[天]玉夫座，雕刻（塑）工人
